rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment states a fact neutrally without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
No moderate verbs paired with scale/impact found.
This segment reports absence of cases ('No human cases have been documented'), a bare negation handled under Q7.
'only one has been reported in Europe' uses the minimiser 'only' with the scale context 'in Europe' to downplay the number of human cases.
